mdRecord.dcterms:title: Des recherches de la France: Plus, vn pourparler du prince, Liure premier / Le tout par Estienne Pasquier, aduocat en la Cour de Parlement de Paris
Ode sur les recherches de E. Pasquier
Pourparler du prince
Pasquier, Etienne, 1529-1615. Recherches de la France
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Pasquier, Etienne, 1529-1615 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Also issued in 1560 with imprint: Paris : Pour Vincent Sertenas. The earliest edition of "Livre second" described by Brunet and Thickett was published in 1565 by Claude Senneton. [original]
"Ode sur les recherches de E. Pasquier, par R. Belleau": leaves ã4-ã6. [original]
Special t.p. (leaf 57) for: Pourparler du prince. -- A Paris : Pour Iean Longis, & Robert le Māgnier ..., 1560. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Trautz-Bauzonnet. Bookplate of René Choppin. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 353. MSS note, which was laid in, has been placed in collection INSERT FILE. [original]
